text: Most of the fetchers, when they return string phenotypic data, return byte strings (in Python3). This is confusing for users that do not understand why a simple string comparison does not work. We should probably decode them before returning.
title: Fetchers return byte strings

text: I would like to work on the issue. Which functions need editing?

> Which functions need editing?

Mostly, functions which returns phenotypic information are located in nilearn/datasets/func.py. You may have to look at those functions.
